snippet: In this installment of a new series from the photo editors of T, we gather a group of images from Alasdair McLellan’s new book, a collection of his photographs of young men and landscapes in and around his native Yorkshire.
abstract: In this installment of a new series from the photo editors of T, we gather a group of images from Alasdair McLellan’s new book, a collection of his photographs of young men and landscapes in and around his native Yorkshire.

headline.main: A Rare Look at a Fashion Photographer's Personal Body of Work
